dashboard.label: Insider Threat - Overview
dashboard.definition: {"visualizations":{"viz_chart_1":{"type":"viz.column","options":{"axisLabelsX.majorLabelStyle.overflowMode":"ellipsisNone","axisLabelsX.majorLabelStyle.rotation":0,"axisTitleX.visibility":"visible","axisTitleY.visibility":"visible","axisTitleY2.visibility":"visible","axisX.abbreviation":"none","axisX.scale":"linear","axisY.abbreviation":"none","axisY.scale":"linear","axisY2.abbreviation":"none","axisY2.enabled":0,"axisY2.scale":"inherit","chart.bubbleMaximumSize":50,"chart.bubbleMinimumSize":10,"chart.bubbleSizeBy":"area","chart.nullValueMode":"gaps","chart.overlayFields":"\"Notable Creation Threshold\"","chart.sliceCollapsingThreshold":0.01,"chart.stackMode":"default","chart.style":"shiny","drilldown":"all","layout.splitSeries":0,"layout.splitSeries.allowIndependentYRanges":0,"legend.labelStyle.overflowMode":"ellipsisNone","legend.mode":"standard","legend.placement":"none","lineWidth":2,"trellis.enabled":0,"trellis.scales.shared":1,"trellis.size":"medium"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1"},"eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.customUrl","options":{"url":"/app/DA-InsiderThreat/user_metrics?form.identity=$row.identity$","newTab":true}}],"title":"Risk Score by User (Highest 10)","description":"Chart showing Top 10 Highest Risk Scores"},"viz_table_1":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"count":10,"dataOverlayMode":"none","drilldown":"cell","rowNumbers":true,"wrap":true},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_2"},"eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.customUrl","options":{"url":"/app/DA-InsiderThreat/incident_review?search=user%3D$row.User$","newTab":true}}],"title":"Open Insider Notables"},"viz_5JrcU6bV":{"type":"viz.singlevalueradial","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_bIE7pPkB"},"title":"New","encoding":{},"options":{"unit":""}},"viz_EyLSupDc":{"type":"viz.singlevalueradial","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_BWPupaKI"},"title":"In Progress"},"viz_5YVHZKQE":{"type":"viz.singlevalueradial","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_8Qs1aoTR"},"title":"Resolved/Closed"}},"dataSources":{"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=it_risk | chart sum(risk_score) AS risk_score by identity | appendcols [|inputlookup notable_trigger_threshold ] | eventstats values(notable_trigger_threshold) AS notable_trigger_threshold | rename notable_trigger_threshold AS \"Notable Creation Threshold\"| sort - risk_score | head 10","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-7d@h","latest":"now"}}},"ds_search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"\n `notable`| search search_name=\"Identity - Insider Threat Risk Threshold Breached - Rule\" | rex \"risk_score=\\\"(?<it_risk_score>\\d+)\\\"\"| stats values(status_group) AS status_group by it_risk_score,user,_time| table _time,status_group,user,it_risk_score | rename status_group AS \"Current Ticket Status\",it_risk_score AS \"Risk Score\",user AS User| appendpipe [| stats count | where count=0 | eval \"Current Ticket Status\"=\"None Found\",User=\"-\",\"Risk Score\"=\"-\"| fields - count]\n ","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h","latest":"now"}}},"ds_bIE7pPkB":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"`notable`| search search_name=\"Identity - Insider Threat Risk Threshold Breached - Rule\" status_label=new | stats count"},"name":"notables_current_status_new"},"ds_BWPupaKI":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"`notable`| search search_name=\"Identity - Insider Threat Risk Threshold Breached - Rule\" status_label=\"In Progress\" | stats count"},"name":"notable_status_inprogress"},"ds_8Qs1aoTR":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"`notable`| search search_name=\"Identity - Insider Threat Risk Threshold Breached - Rule\" status_label=\"Resolved\" OR status_label=\"Closed\"| stats count"},"name":"notable_status_resolved_or_closed"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{}}}}},"inputs":{},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","height":750},"structure":[{"item":"viz_chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":240,"w":1180,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_table_1","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":500,"w":1180,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_5JrcU6bV","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":40,"w":190,"h":190}},{"item":"viz_EyLSupDc","type":"block","position":{"x":490,"y":40,"w":200,"h":190}},{"item":"viz_5YVHZKQE","type":"block","position":{"x":990,"y":40,"w":200,"h":190}}],"globalInputs":[]},"description":"","title":"Insider
